task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 12°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The top of the building is not visible in the current view, so I need to look up to see the entire structure before I can estimate its height.

Now that I can see the entire building from base to roof, I can estimate its height by counting the floors; it appears to be about 6 stories high, and assuming each story is approximately 3.5 meters, the total height is around 21 meters.
